product_name: Earth Nova Scotia Stand Up Paddleboard - 14'
long_description: Remarkably fast and exceptionally stable in all water conditions, this long paddleboard offers ample deck space and attachment points to load up with gear and explore the coast for days at a time.
short_description: Remarkably fast and exceptionally stable in all water conditions, this long paddleboard offers ample deck space and attachment points to load up with gear and explore the coast for days at a time.
